meanings.sent3: The cat pretended to be garotting its toy mouse during playtime.
meanings.sent4: The vines in the jungle seemed to be garotting the trees, holding them tightly.
meanings.sent5: The image of the snake garotting its prey was both terrifying and fascinating.
